module.name: resource_management_characterized

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of characteristics that can be assigned to resource management entities, such as identifiers, approvals, effectivity, etc.

uof.description: This unit of functionality provides the capability to represent resource management characteristics.
